title: Polish banks ranked by brand value in 2015
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This chart shows the Brand of value million at the Polish from PKO_Bank_Polski to Millennium .
\\n In PKO_Bank_Polski the Polish saw 1594 million , in Bank_Pekao there were 1594 million , Bank_Zachodni_WBK saw at least 902 million , 295 million in Millennium and 295 in Millennium .
PKO_Bank_Polski had the highest Brand of million whilst mbank had the lowest .
gold: This statistic illustrates five leading banks domiciled in Poland , ranked by the brand value as of 2015 . The highest position in the ranking was occupied by PKO Bank Polski , with a brand rank value of 1.6 billion U.S. dollars . The fifth in the ranking was Millennium , with the total brand value of 295 million U.S. dollars .
